statements: UPDATE refugees_health_status SET medical_treatment_history = '{"last_treatment_date": "2022-01-15", "treatment_description": "Antibiotics prescribed"}' WHERE refugee_id = 101;
UPDATE refugees_health_status SET country_of_origin = 'Canada', date_of_birth = '1995-07-20' WHERE refugee_id = 102;
UPDATE refugees_health_status SET gender = 'Male', country_of_origin = 'Syria' WHERE refugee_id = 12345;
UPDATE refugees_health_status SET date_of_birth = '1995-08-15', medical_treatment_history = '{"surgeries": 3, "medications": ["Aspirin", "Amoxicillin"]}' WHERE refugee_id = 67890;
UPDATE refugees SET age = 25, gender = 'Female' WHERE refugee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE medical_treatments SET doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith', treatment_type = 'Surgery' WHERE treatment_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE refugees SET name='John Doe', age=25, gender='Male' WHERE refugee_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE medical_treatments SET treatment_type='Physical Therapy', doctor_name='Dr. Smith' WHERE treatment_id='9d01f5a3-d8c1-45ad-b066-d786c09f4022';
UPDATE Refugees SET age = 25, country_of_origin = 'Syria' WHERE refugee_id = 1234;
UPDATE Health_Status SET blood_pressure = '120/80', temperature = 98.6 WHERE health_id = 5678;
UPDATE Refugees SET age = age + 1, country_of_origin = 'Syria' WHERE refugee_id = 101;
UPDATE Health_Status SET temperature = 98.6, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE date = '2022-09-15' AND refugee_id = 201;
UPDATE refugee_personal_info SET nationality='Syrian', first_name='Ahmed', last_name='Khan' WHERE refugee_id=101
UPDATE medical_records SET treatment='Medication', doctor_name='Dr. Smith' WHERE record_id=201
UPDATE refugee_personal_info SET nationality='New Country' WHERE refugee_id=123;
UPDATE medical_records SET diagnosis='Fever', treatment='Antibiotics', doctor_name='Dr. Smith' WHERE record_id=456;
UPDATE refugees SET age = 25, address = 'New Address' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE medication SET dosage = '200mg', side_effects = 'Nausea, Headache' WHERE medication_id = 3;
UPDATE refugees SET age = 25, gender = 'Male', address = '123 Main St, City', nationality = 'Country X' WHERE id = 123
UPDATE health_records SET treatment = 'Physical Therapy', date = '2022-10-15', doctor = 'Dr. Smith', diagnosis = 'Muscle strain' WHERE record_id = 456
